A country I protect."},{"lineNumber":24349,"originalJapaneseLine":"　舐めた真似をする奴は――――」","translatedEnglishLine":"Anyone who dares disrespect it—\""},{"lineNumber":24350,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物兵の姿を間近に捉えた瞬間、","translatedEnglishLine":"The moment he caught sight of the monster soldier up close,"},{"lineNumber":24351,"originalJapaneseLine":"パットンはなんの躊躇いもなく竜の背を蹴った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Patton kicked the dragon's back without hesitation."},{"lineNumber":24352,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なっ………………！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wha...!?!\""},{"lineNumber":24353,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――――許さねえぇぇッ！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I won't forgive youuu!!\""},{"lineNumber":24354,"originalJapaneseLine":"ルメイの顔面に、パットンの拳がぶち込まれた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Patton's fist slammed into Lumei's face."},{"lineNumber":24355,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しょ、うきか、きさまあぁぁぁぁぁッ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-You damned monsterrrrr!?\""},{"lineNumber":24356,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へっ…………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heh...!\""},{"lineNumber":24357,"originalJapaneseLine":"とんでもない重量と衝撃を受けて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Receiving an incredible weight and impact,"},{"lineNumber":24358,"originalJapaneseLine":"ルメイは転落していく。無論、パットンと共に。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lumei fell down. Of course, together with Patton."},{"lineNumber":24359,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょいと空中散歩としゃれ込もうぜ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let's enjoy a little stroll in the air,"},{"lineNumber":24360,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大将軍さんよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"General!\""},{"lineNumber":24361,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、お、うぉああああああぁぁぁぁぁッ！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, whoaahhhhh!!\""},{"lineNumber":24362,"originalJapaneseLine":"もつれ合い、一筋の流星となって、","translatedEnglishLine":"Entangled, like a shooting star,"},{"lineNumber":24363,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人はヘルマンの大地に吸い込まれていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"the two were swallowed by the earth of Helman."},{"lineNumber":24364,"originalJapaneseLine":"……………………","translatedEnglishLine":"............................"},{"lineNumber":24365,"originalJapaneseLine":"「く、っ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...\""},{"lineNumber":24366,"originalJapaneseLine":"ややあって。","translatedEnglishLine":"After a short while."},{"lineNumber":24367,"originalJapaneseLine":"ルメイが、どうにか身を起こす。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lumei somehow managed to get up."},{"lineNumber":24368,"originalJapaneseLine":"「差し違えても……という、つもりか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even if it means mutual destruction... you intended that...?"},{"lineNumber":24369,"originalJapaneseLine":"　がは、人間めが……やってくれる」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gah, human... you really did it.\""},{"lineNumber":24370,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は……ば、爆弾！　爆弾は！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wha... the b-bomb! The bomb!\""},{"lineNumber":24371,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こっちさ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Over here.\""},{"lineNumber":24372,"originalJapaneseLine":"爆弾に付けられた取っ手に指を引っかけて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Hooking a finger on the handle attached to the bomb,"},{"lineNumber":24373,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハンティが傍らに立っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hanty stood at her side."},{"lineNumber":24374,"originalJapaneseLine":"「地面に落としたらヤバそうだったんでね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It seemed dangerous to drop it on the ground,"},{"lineNumber":24375,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その直前で拾っといたよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"so I picked it up just before that happened.\""},{"lineNumber":24376,"originalJapaneseLine":"「カラー……人間の、手先か、っ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Cara... a human's henchman, huh...?\""},{"lineNumber":24377,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……にしても、パットン。あんた、無茶しすぎ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Still, Patton. You're too reckless.\""},{"lineNumber":24378,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ぬ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":24379,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうでもねえさ、っと」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Not really,\""},{"lineNumber":24380,"originalJapaneseLine":"さして傷ついた風もなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"Without looking seriously injured,"},{"lineNumber":24381,"originalJapaneseLine":"ひょいとパットンが身を起こした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Patton easily got up."},{"lineNumber":24382,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴様、生きて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You... you're alive...\""},{"lineNumber":24383,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大将軍に下敷きになってもらったからな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because the great general was laying on me."},{"lineNumber":24384,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まあ、大した事はない」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, it's no big deal.\""},{"lineNumber":24385,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ンなこと平気で抜かせるのはあんたぐらいだ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're about the only one who can say such a thing so casually..."},{"lineNumber":24386,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それもそうだけど、爆弾も","translatedEnglishLine":"That's true, but the bomb too,"},{"lineNumber":24387,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そっちはフォローしてくれると思ってたぜ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I thought you'd cover for that."},{"lineNumber":24388,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その辺は信頼してるからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"I trust you in that area.\""},{"lineNumber":24389,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく……考えなしの馬鹿は変わんないね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Seriously... foolish idiots never change.\""},{"lineNumber":24390,"originalJapaneseLine":"「く、ククク……まったく……人間という奴は……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ku, kukuku... honestly... humans are...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあそう言うな、すぐに終わる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, don't say that, it'll be over soon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寄せてくれ」
いぶかりながらも、
キャンテルはパットンの意図を悟り、
言われるままに魔物兵に接近する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and approached the monster soldier as instructed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本気も本気、大本気よ。
……ここは俺の国だ。俺が守る国だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...This is my country. A country I protect.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 舐めた真似をする奴は――――」
魔物兵の姿を間近に捉えた瞬間、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The moment he caught sight of the monster soldier up close,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットンはなんの躊躇いもなく竜の背を蹴った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton kicked the dragon's back without hesitation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――――許さねえぇぇッ！！」
ルメイの顔面に、パットンの拳がぶち込まれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton's fist slammed into Lumei's face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しょ、うきか、きさまあぁぁぁぁぁッ！？」
とんでもない重量と衝撃を受けて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Receiving an incredible weight and impact,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルメイは転落していく。無論、パットンと共に。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lumei fell down. Of course, together with Patton.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょいと空中散歩としゃれ込もうぜ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's enjoy a little stroll in the air,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大将軍さんよ！」
「う、お、うぉああああああぁぁぁぁぁッ！！」
もつれ合い、一筋の流星となって、
二人はヘルマンの大地に吸い込まれていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the two were swallowed by the earth of Helman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ややあって。
ルメイが、どうにか身を起こす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lumei somehow managed to get up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「差し違えても……という、つもりか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even if it means mutual destruction... you intended that...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がは、人間めが……やってくれる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gah, human... you really did it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は……ば、爆弾！　爆弾は！」
「こっちさ」
爆弾に付けられた取っ手に指を引っかけて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hooking a finger on the handle attached to the bomb,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハンティが傍らに立っていた。
「地面に落としたらヤバそうだったんでね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It seemed dangerous to drop it on the ground,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その直前で拾っといたよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I picked it up just before that happened."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カラー……人間の、手先か、っ……」
「……にしても、パットン。あんた、無茶しすぎ」
「そうでもねえさ、っと」
さして傷ついた風もなく、
ひょいとパットンが身を起こした。
「貴様、生きて……」
「大将軍に下敷きになってもらったからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because the great general was laying on me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあ、大した事はない」
「ンなこと平気で抜かせるのはあんたぐらいだ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're about the only one who can say such a thing so casually...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それもそうだけど、爆弾も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's true, but the bomb too,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そっちはフォローしてくれると思ってたぜ。
その辺は信頼してるからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I trust you in that area."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく……考えなしの馬鹿は変わんないね」
「く、ククク……まったく……人間という奴は……

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
